      public org.apache.commons.collections4.Transformer<java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Object>,​java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Object>> getItemTransformer()

    • setItemTransformer

      public void setItemTransformer​(org.apache.commons.collections4.Transformer<java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Object>,​java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Object>> itemTransformer)
      A class that implements org.apache.commons.collections4.Transformer (https://commons.apache.org/proper/commons-collections/javadocs/api-4.3/index.html) If populated, the "transform()" method will be called for each record in the results of the query. Use this method to add/update fields in the results that can derived from queried content. (For example, the description of an enum value)
      Parameters:
      itemTransformer -
